page.title: 16SHOPPING
page.content:
{SHOPPING { {Locations
In our area there are{5}local shopping precincts, they are situated on junctions of major roads near housing estates. They are evenly distributed in our area.
{Shopping Services Provided
In our area there is nearly every shop you need to do all your shopping. There are hardware shops, greencrocers and supermarkets etc. Included in these shops there are also services such as building societies,hairdressers and bookmakers. {1}of the shopping precincts has an adequetely sized car park.
